channel.title: CVE Feed for Noor alam -- Magical Posts Display – Elementor & Gutenberg Posts Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Noor alam -- Magical Posts Display – Elementor & Gutenberg Posts Blocks

item.title: CVE-2024-37951|2024-07-22T13:35:11.224Z -- noor%20alam -- magical%20posts%20display%20%E2%80%93%20elementor%20%26%20gutenberg%20posts%20blocks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Noor alam Magical Posts Display – Elementor & Gutenberg Posts Blocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Magical Posts Display – Elementor & Gutenberg Posts Blocks: from n/a through 1.2.38.
